name: CULOSSEUM
description:
YOU ARE THE FALLEN DEMON OF ROME.

YOUR MISSION? DESTROY THE PLACE.

INVOKE YOUR DEAR SUBDITES TO DESTROY THE CITY WHERE YOU REBORN, BECOME THE NEW KING.

- Space:
in the intro. space to start the game.

- Right Click:

Tell the fallen demon of rome where to go, it also works with troops.

- Left Click:

Select your troops with this, if you press shift and click, you can select several at once, but if you do not select any and you already had them selected, all will be deselected.

-Key Z:

You can stop your character, be careful, you have to hold it tight or the fallen demon of rome will not obey orders.

-Key X:

You can select your troops that you want to summon, use the wheel of the mouse to decide one of the 3 classes you have.
